description: An adrenaline-packed, budget-friendly 6-day solo adventure in Laos, exploring caves, waterfalls, rivers, and mountain viewpoints across Vang Vieng and Luang Prabang.

activities: Arrive in Vientiane, take a local bus to Vang Vieng (~3-4 hrs). Check into budget guesthouse. Evening tubing on Nam Song River. Dinner at Luang Prabang Bakery.
itinerary.transportation: Local bus Vientiane to Vang Vieng, tuk-tuks, walking
itinerary.notes: Keep valuables secure during bus rides.

activities: Morning hike to Blue Lagoon, swimming and cave exploration. Lunch at a riverside café. Optional cycling around Vang Vieng countryside. Sunset viewpoints hike. Dinner at Gary's Irish Bar.
itinerary.transportation: Walking, bicycle rental, tuk-tuk as needed
itinerary.notes: Be prepared for muddy trails if it rains, carry a dry bag for electronics.

activities: Bus from Vang Vieng to Luang Prabang (~5 hrs), check into hostel. Late afternoon climb Mount Phousi for panoramic views. Visit Luang Prabang Night Market and sample street food for dinner.
itinerary.transportation: Bus Vang Vieng to Luang Prabang, walking, tuk-tuk
accommodation: Hostel or budget guesthouse in Luang Prabang
itinerary.notes: Have snacks and water for the bus ride; cash for street food.

activities: Half-day trip to Kuang Si Waterfalls (swim, hike, explore bear sanctuary). Picnic lunch by the falls. Return to Luang Prabang, explore old town and temples (Wat Xieng Thong). Local dinner at Tamarind Restaurant.
itinerary.transportation: Minivan/tour bus to Kuang Si Waterfalls, walking
accommodation: Hostel or budget guesthouse in Luang Prabang
itinerary.notes: Kuang Si closes by 5pm. Wear swimwear under clothes, bring towel. Entry fee required.

activities: Early morning boat ride to Pak Ou Caves. Visit riverside villages by slow boat. Return to Luang Prabang for lunch and last-minute exploring/shopping. Night at hostel.
itinerary.transportation: Slow boat to Pak Ou Caves, walking
accommodation: Hostel or budget guesthouse in Luang Prabang
itinerary.notes: Boat trips may be impacted by river conditions. Confirm schedule a day ahead.

activities: Check out, free morning for relaxed stroll or final market shopping. Depart from Luang Prabang by bus or flight.
accommodation: Hostel or budget guesthouse in Luang Prabang
itinerary.notes: Confirm onward transport times in advance and account for Laos' relaxed pace.
